summary: Silver Texture Replacer for Amulet of Mara
descriptionHtml:
This is just a simple texture replacer for the Amulet of Mara. Personally, I do not like gold. I know I am not the only one. I have not seen a mod yet to change it, other than a complete redesign of the amulet.

Download and install with your choice of NMM or MO.

I may be adding more versions later of different metals and/or gemstone colours.

I DO NOT ALLOW UPLOADING OF MY FILES TO OTHER SITES OR BLOGS. DO NOT EMAIL ASKING FOR PERMISSION. AS ALWAYS, I WILL SAY NO.
author: ViciousSARR

files.name: VS Silver Amulet of Mara Retex
